entry.title: Badminton-management-system(三)
entry.content:
三：mybatis-flex代码生成器

  1. 使用mybatis-flex的代码生成器快速生成代码和结构

    使用的Maven依赖如下

    `
    com.mybatis-flex
    mybatis-flex-spring-boot3-starter
    1.9.3

    com.mybatis-flex mybatis-flex-processor 1.9.3 provided`

  2. 在pom.xml同级目录下创建mybatis-flex.config文件并配置

entry.title: Badminton-management-system(二)
entry.content:
二：优化数据库，进行CRUD

  1. 为方便进行springboot项目的创建，使用了该网站进行创建并初始化项目

    orm则使用了Mybatis-flex

  2. 优化主键为自增主键，方便查询

  3. gitee创建仓库存放代码

  4. 为项目配置数据库application.yml

server: port: 8080 spring: datasource: username: root password: yujiawei url: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/badminton?useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver

entry.title: Badminton-management-system(一)
entry.content:
一：数据库的建表

  1. 系统面向用户与管理员。功能包括预约，场地管理等。

    使用mysql作为数据库。

  2. 在构建好所需表后，为每个表新增create_time,update_time,delete_time字段,

    其中delete_time用于判断该表是否删除

  3. 设置部分字段编码格式为utf-8mb4 general ci,支持表情符号等

  4. 为长文本格式的字段设置为mediumtex，将逻辑判断的字段类型设置为tinyInt，长度为1

  5. 为每个字段编写注释

`SET NAMES utf8mb4;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;

– Table structure for admin

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin;
CREATE TABLE admin (
admin_id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT ‘管理员id’,
admin_name varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT ‘管理员账号’,
admin_password varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘管理员密码’,
admin_state tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT ‘账号是否封禁’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘创建时间’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
PRIMARY KEY (admin_id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 11 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

– Table structure for article

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS article;
CREATE TABLE article (
id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT ‘文章id’,
title varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT ‘文章标题’,
content mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL COMMENT ‘文章内容’,
topping tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT ‘是否置顶（0|1）’,
admin_id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传者id’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传时间’,
PRIMARY KEY (id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 6 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

– Table structure for booking_info

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS booking_info;
CREATE TABLE booking_info (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘场地编号’,
user_id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘预约的用户id’,
id_time int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘预约时间对应的id编号’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传时间’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
version int(0) NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT ‘乐观锁’,
PRIMARY KEY (user_id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

– Table structure for booking_time

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS booking_time;
CREATE TABLE booking_time (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘场地编号’,
id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘时间段id’,
time varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘id对应的时间段’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传时间’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
PRIMARY KEY (id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

– Table structure for site_info

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS site_info;
CREATE TABLE site_info (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘场地编号’,
site_state tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘是否有其他活动正在举办’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传时间’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
PRIMARY KEY (site_code) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

– Table structure for user

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user;
CREATE TABLE user (
user_id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT ‘用户id’,
user_name varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT ‘用户账号’,
user_password varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘用户密码’,
sex tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT ‘用户性别’,
phone varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘电话号码’,
info varchar(500) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘用户信息’,
user_state tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT ‘账号是否被封禁’,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘修改时间’,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ‘删除时间’,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT ‘上传时间’,
PRIMARY KEY (user_id, user_name) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 20 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;`

entry.content:
